member.name: T:AIGame.Core.Agent
member.summary: Base class for all agents in the game (e.g., player, NPCs, AI opponents). Handles unique IDs, detection properties, and alive state.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.Agent.IsAlive
member.summary: Indicates whether this agent is currently alive in the game.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.Agent.MyDetectable
member.summary: The component attached to this agent (used for AI sensing or targeting).

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.Agent.AgentID
member.summary: Unique, incrementing ID assigned to this agent instance.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.Agent.nextId
member.summary: Static counter used to assign unique IDs to agents.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Agent.Awake
member.summary: Unity callback invoked when the component is initialized. Assigns a unique ID, caches the component, and marks the agent as alive.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Agent.Respawn(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Respawns the agent at the specified world position and restores its active state. Implement this in subclasses to define exact respawn behavior (e.g., animations, state reset).
member.param: The world-space position where the agent should reappear.

member.name: T:AIGame.Core.AgentFactory
member.summary: Base factory for creating AI agent lineups from a prefab. Subclasses implement to specify which agents to spawn.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.AgentFactory.FactoryName
member.summary: Display name for this factory (used in menus/UI).

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.AgentFactory.CreateAgents(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Create the raw agent selection for one team from the given prefab.
member.param: The agent prefab to instantiate or reference.
member.returns: An array of entries (may contain nulls or be empty). The array length determines the requested team size before normalization.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.AgentFactory.GetAgents(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Returns a normalized agent array sized to GameManager.Instance.AgentsPerTeam.
member.param: The agent prefab supplied to the factory.
member.returns: A non-null array whose length equals AgentsPerTeam. Null entries from are replaced by the first non-null agent. If too many agents are returned they are trimmed; if too few, the array is padded with duplicates. Returns when the prefab is null, the result is empty, or all entries are null.

member.name: T:AIGame.Core.Ball
member.summary: Represents a ball projectile in the game. Can be "armed" to indicate it can cause effects when colliding.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.Ball.Armed
member.summary: Indicates whether the ball is active and able to trigger its effects.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.Ball.Parent
member.summary: Reference to the entity that launched or owns this ball.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Ball.Start
member.summary: Unity Start method. Called before the first frame update after this is created.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Ball.OnCollisionEnter(UnityEngine.Collision)
member.summary: Unity collision callback. Disarms the ball and schedules destruction if it hits something other than an Agent.

member.name: T:AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent
member.summary: Immutable snapshot of an agent that can be safely cached and passed around. Contains only value types (no references to scene objects).

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent.Id
member.summary: Unique agent identifier.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent.Position
member.summary: World position of the agent when the snapshot was taken.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent.Frame
member.summary: Unity frame index in which this snapshot was recorded.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent.#ctor(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Int32)
member.summary: Internal constructor for value snapshots.
member.param: Unique ID of the perceived agent.
Unity frame number when the snapshot was taken.

member.name: T:AIGame.Core.BaseAI
member.summary: Base class for AI agents providing movement (NavMesh), perception, combat scaffolding, dodge/respawn handling, animation hooks, and a runtime vision-cone mesh.

member.name: T:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StatType
member.summary: Types of stats that can be allocated to modify the AI's capabilities.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StatType.Speed
member.summary: Increases movement speed (clamped by maxMovementSpeed).

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StatType.VisionRange
member.summary: Increases maximum vision range (used by perception checks).

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StatType.ProjectileRange
member.summary: Increases maximum effective projectile range.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StatType.ReloadSpeed
member.summary: Reduces reload time for throws.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StatType.DodgeCooldown
member.summary: Reduces time between dodges.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.VisionRange
member.summary: Maximum distance this AI can see targets.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.ProjectileRange
member.summary: Maximum horizontal distance the AI will attempt to throw projectiles.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.IsDodging
member.summary: Whether the AI is currently dodging.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.All
member.summary: Global list of all active instances.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.CurrentTarget
member.summary: Current target snapshot if any.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.HasTarget
member.summary: True if has a value.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.FriendlyEnterVision
member.summary: Raised when a friendly enters vision.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.FriendlyExitVision
member.summary: Raised when a friendly exits vision.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.EnemyEnterVision
member.summary: Raised when an enemy enters vision.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.EnemyExitVision
member.summary: Raised when an enemy exits vision.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.VisibleFriendlyDeath
member.summary: Raised when a visible friendly dies.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnVisibleFriendlyDeath(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Invokes the event.
member.param: World position of the lethal hit or notifying origin.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.BallDetected
member.summary: Raised when an enemy ball is detected.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnBallDetected(AIGame.Core.Ball)
member.summary: Invokes the event.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Respawned
member.summary: Raised when the agent respawns.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Death
member.summary: Raised when the agent dies.

member.name: E:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.DodgeComplete
member.summary: Raised when a dodge finishes.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.MyFlagCarrier
member.summary: Access to this agent's if present.

member.name: P:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.NavMeshAgent
member.summary: The used for navigation.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Awake
member.summary: Unity Awake: caches required components, loads resources, and initializes fields.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Start
member.summary: Unity Start: configures stats, builds the vision cone mesh, then starts AI logic.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Update
member.summary: Unity Update: updates perception/animation/dodge and runs periodic decision ticks.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.ShowVisionCone(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables the runtime vision cone visibility.
member.param: True to show the cone, false to hide it.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnEnable
member.summary: Unity OnEnable: registers this instance in the global list.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnDisable
member.summary: Unity OnDisable: deregisters this instance from the global list.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Execute
member.summary: Runs a single decision step: validates state, refreshes target if necessary, then calls .

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.AllocateStat(AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StatType,System.Single)
member.summary: Allocates points to a specific stat, applying side effects and enforcing caps.
member.param: Amount to allocate (rounded up to cost).
member.returns: True if allocation succeeded; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.UpdateAnimation
member.summary: Updates animation parameters based on current movement and strafing state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StartAI
member.summary: Implement to initialize AI-specific state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.ConfigureStats
member.summary: Implement to assign stat points via .

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.ExecuteAI
member.summary: Implement to perform AI decisions each decision tick.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnVisionCheck(AIGame.Core.Detectable,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Vision callback invoked by the AI manager at fixed intervals. Handles ally/enemy/ball visibility bookkeeping.
member.param: The entity that was evaluated for visibility.
True if the entity is visible this check; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.UpdateVisionCone
member.summary: Updates the runtime vision-cone mesh and material based on current FOV and occlusion.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.CanSeeTarget(AIGame.Core.Detectable)
member.summary: Tests whether a is within FOV and unobstructed by occluders.
member.returns: True if the target is visible; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.GetVisibleEnemiesSnapshot
member.summary: Returns a fresh array of visible enemies for the current frame. The returned list contains only value snapshots, not live references.
member.returns: Array copy of current visible enemies.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.GetVisibleAlliesSnapshot
member.summary: Returns a fresh array of visible allies for the current frame. The returned list contains only value snapshots, not live references.
member.returns: Array copy of current visible allies.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.TryGetTarget(AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent@)
member.summary: Tries to get the current target snapshot.
member.param: Outputs the current target if available.
member.returns: True if a target exists; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.RefreshTarget
member.summary: Refreshes to this frame's snapshot if still visible; otherwise clears the target.
member.returns: True if a refreshed target remains; false if it was removed.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.SetTarget(System.Nullable{AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent})
member.summary: Sets the current target snapshot (or clears it when null).
member.param: The snapshot to set as current target, or null to clear.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.RefreshOrAcquireTarget
member.summary: Keeps the same target if still visible; otherwise acquires the first visible enemy (if any).

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.TrySetTargetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to set the current target by agent ID from this frame's visible enemies.
member.returns: True if a matching visible enemy was found; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.TryGetVisibleEnemyById(System.Int32,AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent@)
member.summary: Searches the current frame's visible enemies by ID.
member.param: Outputs the matching snapshot if found.
member.returns: True if found; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.RemoveTarget
member.summary: Clears the current target.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.TryThrowAtTarget(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Attempts to start a throw sequence toward a world position. Initiates wind-up, throw, and reload if not already busy.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.TryThrow
member.summary: Checks whether a throw can start (not already throwing or reloading).
member.returns: True if a throw can begin; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Reload
member.summary: Begins reloading if not already reloading.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.ReloadRoutine
member.summary: Reload coroutine that waits for the current reloadTime.
member.returns: Coroutine enumerator.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.WindupRoutine(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Handles wind-up animation before the actual throw.
member.param: World-space target position at wind-up time.
member.returns: Coroutine enumerator.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.ThrowRoutine(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Plays the throw animation and waits for it to complete.
member.param: World-space target position for the throw.
member.returns: Coroutine enumerator.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnThrowAnimationComplete
member.summary: Called when the throw animation completes; clears throwing flag and triggers reload.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Throw(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Performs the actual projectile instantiation and launch toward a world position.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.ThrowBallAt(AIGame.Core.PerceivedAgent)
member.summary: Convenience method to face and throw at a perceived target (validated same-frame visibility).
member.param: Perceived target snapshot (must be from current frame).
member.returns: True if a throw started; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnCollisionEnter(UnityEngine.Collision)
member.summary: Unity collision: applies ragdoll impulse on lethal ball hit and triggers death.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.ApplyHit(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Applies an impulse to an appropriate rigidbody on the ragdoll.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.FindClosestMajorRigidbody(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Finds the closest "major" rigidbody (pelvis/spine/head) to the given point; falls back to any rigidbody.
member.returns: The closest major rigidbody, or another rigidbody if no major parts exist.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Die(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Handles death: notifies allies in vision, disables control/vision, stops navigation, clears local state, and requests a respawn from the .
member.param: World position associated with the lethal event (e.g., attacker).

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.Respawn(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Respawns the agent at the specified world position. Re-enables movement and visuals.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.MoveTo(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Issues a pathfind command toward a world-space destination.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StrafeTo(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Moves while keeping current facing (no agent rotation). Useful for strafing.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StopMoving
member.summary: Immediately stops movement, clears path, and resets strafing.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.StartDodge(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Starts a dodge in a given direction if not on cooldown.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.CanDodge
member.summary: Returns whether a dodge can start (not dodging and off cooldown).
member.returns: True if a dodge is allowed; otherwise false.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.HandleDodge
member.summary: Per-frame dodge processing: translates the agent and handles end-of-dodge restoration.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.RestoreFacingAfterDelay(System.Single)
member.summary: After a short delay, smoothly restores the facing to the pre-dodge direction.
member.param: Seconds to wait before restoring facing.
member.returns: Coroutine enumerator.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.FaceDirection(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Instantly faces a given world-space direction (yaw only; Y component is ignored).
member.param: Direction to face in world space.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.FaceTarget(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Faces toward a world-space position.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnTriggerEnter(UnityEngine.Collider)
member.summary: Unity trigger enter: tracks entry into capturable zones.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.BaseAI.OnTriggerExit(UnityEngine.Collider)
member.summary: Unity trigger exit: tracks exit from capturable zones.

member.name: T:AIGame.Core.Billboard
member.summary: A component that orients the object to always face a specified camera. Useful for UI elements or markers that should remain readable regardless of the camera's position.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.Billboard.targetCamera
member.summary: The camera that this object will face. If not assigned, the main camera will be used.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Billboard.Awake
member.summary: Unity Awake method. Called when the script instance is being loaded. Sets the target camera to the main camera if none is assigned.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Billboard.LateUpdate
member.summary: Unity LateUpdate method. Called every frame after all Update calls. Rotates the object to face the target camera.

member.name: T:AIGame.Core.CPState
member.summary: Possible states for a Control Point in the game.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.CPState.Uncontested
member.summary: No team is currently contesting the point.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.CPState.Flipping
member.summary: The point is in the process of flipping to another team.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.CPState.Controlled
member.summary: The point is fully controlled by a team.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.CPState.Overtime
member.summary: The point is in overtime mode.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.CPState.GameOver
member.summary: The game has ended.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.CPState.Deplete
member.summary: The point is losing progress toward capture.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.CPState.Locked
member.summary: The point is locked and cannot be captured.

member.name: T:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager
member.summary: Handles procedural instancing and placement of grass and flower meshes on a ground surface, using HSV-based color filtering from the ground texture to determine valid spawn locations.

member.summary: The mesh used for grass instances.

member.summary: The material used for grass instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.grassCount
member.summary: Total number of grass blades to attempt to spawn.

member.summary: The mesh used for flower instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.flowerMaterial
member.summary: The material used for flower instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.flowerCount
member.summary: Total number of flowers to attempt to spawn.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.ground
member.summary: The ground GameObject (must have MeshRenderer and MeshCollider) used as placement reference.

member.summary: The target hue color for valid spawn areas.

member.summary: Allowed deviation from the target hue.

member.summary: Minimum saturation threshold for valid spawn pixels.

member.summary: Minimum value (brightness) threshold for valid spawn pixels.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.maxTiltAngle
member.summary: Maximum tilt angle applied to each instance for variation.

member.summary: Range of random width scaling for instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.heightRange
member.summary: Range of random height scaling for instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.depthRange
member.summary: Range of random depth scaling for instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.rayHeight
member.summary: Height above the ground from which placement raycasts originate.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.rayDepth
member.summary: Maximum raycast depth when detecting the ground.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.maxAttemptsMul
member.summary: Number of random placement attempts per desired instance.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.groundTexture
member.summary: The ground's main texture used for color sampling.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.grassMatrices
member.summary: Transform matrices for all spawned grass instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.flowerMatrices
member.summary: Transform matrices for all spawned flower instances.

member.summary: Number of successfully spawned grass instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.flowerSpawned
member.summary: Number of successfully spawned flower instances.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.groundBounds
member.summary: The world-space bounds of the ground mesh.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.groundMask
member.summary: Layer mask for detecting the ground.

member.name: F:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.targetH
member.summary: Precomputed hue value from for filtering.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.Start
member.summary: Unity Start method. Initializes materials, validates the ground object, loads the texture, and procedurally spawns grass and flower instances using HSV filtering.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.FoilageManager.Update
member.summary: Unity Update method. Draws the grass and flower instances each frame using GPU instancing.

member.summary: Attempts to sample a random point on the ground that matches the HSV color filter.
member.param: The resulting world-space hit position if successful.
member.returns: True if a valid point was found, false otherwise.

member.summary: Creates a transformation matrix for an instance at the given position, applying random rotation, tilt, and scaling.
member.param: The world-space position of the instance.
member.returns: A TRS transformation matrix.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Ragdoll.Awake
member.summary: Unity Awake method. Initializes references, configures joint limits, and disables physics at start.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Ragdoll.Enable
member.summary: Enables ragdoll mode by activating all rigidbodies and colliders, and disabling the main collider.

member.name: M:AIGame.Core.Ragdoll.Disable
member.summary: Disables ragdoll mode by deactivating all rigidbodies and colliders, and enabling the main collider.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState
member.summary: Base class for AI states in a simple finite state machine. Supports optional nested substates that are entered/executed/exited together.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState.parent
member.summary: The owning AI instance.

member.name: P:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState.Name
member.summary: Display name for debugging.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState.subStates
member.summary: Optional nested substates that run with this state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,System.String,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates a new state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState.Enter
member.summary: Called when entering this state. Invokes on all substates.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState.Exit
member.summary: Called when exiting this state. Invokes on all substates.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState.Execute
member.summary: Called every update while this state is active. Invokes on all substates.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.Idle
member.summary: A no-op idle state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.Idle.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI)
member.summary: Creates an idle state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.MoveToPosition
member.summary: Base state for moving to a world position, raising an event on arrival.

member.name: E:AIGame.Examples.MoveToPosition.DestinationReached
member.summary: Raised exactly once when the destination is reached.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.MoveToPosition.currentDestination
member.summary: Current target world position.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.MoveToPosition.hasReachedDestination
member.summary: True after arrival is detected.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.MoveToPosition.ARRIVAL_THRESHOLD
member.summary: Distance threshold to consider arrival.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MoveToPosition.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,System.String,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates a move state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.MoveToObjective
member.summary: Moves near the current match objective.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MoveToObjective.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.Combat
member.summary: State for engaging visible enemies.

member.name: E:AIGame.Examples.Combat.NoMoreEnemies
member.summary: Raised when there are no visible enemies.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.Combat.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.ProtectObjective
member.summary: Patrols around the objective by moving to random nearby offsets.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ProtectObjective.currentDestination
member.summary: Current patrol destination.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ProtectObjective.ARRIVAL_THRESHOLD
member.summary: Arrival threshold for patrol hops.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ProtectObjective.hasDestination
member.summary: Whether a destination has been set.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ProtectObjective.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.Strafe
member.summary: Strafes left/right around current position.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.Strafe.movingRight
member.summary: Current strafe direction flag.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.Strafe.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI)
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.Dodge
member.summary: Performs a dodge when a hostile ball is detected nearby.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.Dodge.ball
member.summary: Last detected hostile ball.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.Dodge.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI)
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.Dodge.OnBallDetected(AIGame.Core.Ball)
member.summary: AI hook for ball sightings.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.FollowEnemy
member.summary: Follows a visible enemy and stops at preferred engagement range.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FollowEnemy.stopped
member.summary: Whether the agent has issued a stop after entering range.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FollowEnemy.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.MoveToEnemyZone
member.summary: Moves toward the opposing team's flag zone.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MoveToEnemyZone.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.MoveToFriendlyZone
member.summary: Moves toward the friendly team's flag zone.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MoveToFriendlyZone.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.FollowFriendlyFlag
member.summary: Follows the friendly flag's current position.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FollowFriendlyFlag.flag
member.summary: Cached friendly flag.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FollowFriendlyFlag.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.MoveToEnemyFlag
member.summary: Moves to the current position of the enemy flag.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MoveToEnemyFlag.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.ChaseEnemyCarrier
member.summary: Chases the current enemy flag carrier if visible; attacks when in range.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ChaseEnemyCarrier.enemyCarrierId
member.summary: Stable ID of the enemy carrier to chase; -1 if none.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ChaseEnemyCarrier.enemyCarrier
member.summary: Per-frame snapshot of the target carrier.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ChaseEnemyCarrier.myFlag
member.summary: Reference to own team's flag.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ChaseEnemyCarrier.enemyFlag
member.summary: Reference to enemy team's flag.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ChaseEnemyCarrier.#ctor(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState[])
member.summary: Creates the state and resolves team flags.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ChaseEnemyCarrier.RefreshEnemyCarrierSnapshot
member.summary: Updates the cached snapshot of the enemy carrier if visible this frame.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.EasyAI
member.summary: AI class for an easy agent that simply runs toward the objective.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.EasyAI.StartAI
member.summary: Called when the AI is initialized. Responsible for creating states, setting up listeners, and defining transitions.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.EasyAI.ConfigureStats
member.summary: Configures the base stats for this AI instance.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.EasyAI.OnObjectiveReached
member.summary: Called when the AI reaches the objective. Switches state to .

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.EasyAI.OnRespawned
member.summary: Called when the AI respawns. Switches state to .

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.EasyFactory
member.summary: Factory that spawns EasyAI agents. Creates a full team of agents using the EasyAI behaviour.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.EasyFactory.CreateAgents(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Creates a set of EasyAI agents for one team.
member.param: The prefab used for each agent.
member.returns: An array containing the spawned EasyAI agents.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI
member.summary: Base class for example AI agents. Provides a finite state machine implementation for switching between states based on values.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.AICondition
member.summary: Represents the possible conditions that can trigger a state change.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.currentState
member.summary: The current active state.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.transitions
member.summary: Maps a tuple of (current state, condition) to the next state.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.currentCondition
member.summary: The condition currently set, which may trigger a state change.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.ExecuteAI
member.summary: Main update logic for the AI. Runs once per frame as part of execution.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.SetCondition(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.AICondition)
member.summary: Sets the current condition to be evaluated in the next update cycle.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.AddTransition(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.AICondition,AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState)
member.summary: Adds a state transition rule.
member.param: The condition that triggers the change.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.ProcessTransitions
member.summary: Checks if the current state and condition match any registered transition rule. Changes the state if a match is found.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.ExampleAI.ChangeState(AIGame.Examples.ExampleAIState)
member.summary: Changes the current state, calling on the old state and on the new state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI
member.summary: AI that plays capture-the-flag. Will try to capture the enemy flag and return the friendly flag if it is taken. Uses a utility-based decision-making system.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.myFlag
member.summary: Reference to this agent's own team flag.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.enemyFlag
member.summary: Reference to the opposing team's flag.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.utilities
member.summary: Dictionary of utility function names mapped to their scoring functions. Each function returns a score representing how desirable that action is.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.actions
member.summary: Dictionary of action names mapped to the actual actions (state changes) to perform.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.friendlyFlagIsDropped
member.summary: True if the friendly flag has been dropped in the field.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.flagsSpawned
member.summary: True if both flags have been spawned into the game.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.idle
member.summary: Cached reference to the idle state.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.lastAction
member.summary: The name of the last action performed. Used to prevent re-entering the same state unnecessarily.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.OnFlagSpawned
member.summary: Event handler called when both flags are spawned into the scene.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.CalculateEnemyFlagUtility
member.summary: Calculates the utility of moving to capture the enemy flag.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.CalculateChaseEnemyFlagCarrier
member.summary: Calculates the utility of chasing the enemy flag carrier.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.CalculateFriendlyZoneUtility
member.summary: Calculates the utility of returning to the friendly flag zone.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.CalculateFriendlyFlagUtility
member.summary: Calculates the utility of moving to retrieve the friendly flag.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierAI.CalculateIdle
member.summary: Calculates the utility of idling.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierFactory
member.summary: Factory that spawns FlagCarrierAI agents. Creates a full team of agents that attempt to capture the enemy flag and return the friendly flag.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.FlagCarrierFactory.CreateAgents(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Creates a set of FlagCarrierAI agents for one team.
member.param: The prefab used for each agent.
member.returns: An array containing the spawned FlagCarrierAI agents.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.HardAI
member.summary: A "Hard" difficulty AI that: - Moves toward objectives - Engages in combat with enemies - Strafes and dodges incoming projectiles - Protects objectives when reached Uses a finite state machine with transitions triggered by in-game events.

member.name: F:AIGame.Examples.HardAI.idle
member.summary: Cached reference to the idle state for quick resetting after death.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.HardAI.Ondeath
member.summary: Called when the AI dies. Resets to idle state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.HardAI.OnObjectiveReached
member.summary: Called when the objective is reached. Switches to the protect-objective state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.HardAI.OnEnemyEnterVision
member.summary: Called when an enemy enters the AI's vision range. Switches to combat state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.HardAI.OnNomoreEnemies
member.summary: Called when there are no more visible enemies. Switches to move-to-objective state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.HardAI.OnSpawned
member.summary: Called when the AI respawns. Switches to spawned state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.TestFactory
member.summary: Factory that spawns HardAI agents. Creates a full team of agents that run to objectives, engage enemies, and dodge incoming projectiles.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.TestFactory.CreateAgents(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Creates a set of HardAI agents for one team.
member.param: The prefab used for each agent.
member.returns: An array containing the spawned HardAI agents.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.MediumAI
member.summary: A "Medium" difficulty AI that: - Moves toward objectives - Engages in combat with enemies Uses a finite state machine with transitions based on in-game events.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MediumAI.OnObjectiveReached
member.summary: Called when the objective is reached. Switches to the idle state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MediumAI.OnNomoreEnemies
member.summary: Called when there are no more visible enemies. Switches to the move-to-objective state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MediumAI.OnEnemyEnterVision
member.summary: Called when an enemy enters the AI's vision range. Switches to the combat state.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.MediumAI.OnRespawned
member.summary: Called when the AI respawns. Switches to the move-to-objective state.

member.name: T:AIGame.Examples.OpponentFactory
member.summary: Factory that spawns MediumAI agents. MediumAI agents run to objectives and engage enemies they encounter.

member.name: M:AIGame.Examples.OpponentFactory.CreateAgents(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Creates a set of MediumAI agents for one team.
member.param: The prefab used for each agent.
member.returns: An array containing the spawned MediumAI agents.
